The Social Burger Extravaganza for Dew D.description: February - from selected four burgers, $4 will be donated to The Dew Drop Inn Thunder Bay (Smokehouse Hero, Tropical Heatwave, Honey Ham Smashburger, Firecracker Smashburger)
